roleset.name: throw
roleset.note: PITCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pitch' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from pitch.01-v predicate notes)
PITCH-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry pitch.01. Corresponds to VN Class throw-17.1-1. (from pitch.01-n)

example.name: another direction
example.text: ``Stocks-1 were being pitched *trace*-1 out of windows at any price.''

example.name: boring example
example.text: He already has achieved vertical integration on a limited scale: Quebecor-1 can put a weekly newspaper on almost any Quebec doorstep without using outside help, from chopping down the tree to making the newsprint to *trace*-1 pitching it up onto the porch.

example.name: pitching as advertising
example.text: But now, [Charlie Brown]-1 is about *trace*-1 to start *trace*-1 pitching everything from Chex Party Mix to light bulbs.
example.arg: everything from Chex Party Mix to light bulbs

example.name: args 0 & 2
example.text: Ben equates this adrenaline rush to that brief moment of silence by the crowd when a baseball player delivers his pitch to the plate.

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: Permison made his biggest pitch of the game and struck out Prokopowicz.

roleset.name: set a musical tone
roleset.note: PITCH-V NOTES: Verbal usage of this sense is vanishingly rare. (from pitch.02-v)

example.name: almost adjectival
example.text: It isn't every day that we hear a Violetta who can sing the first act's high-flying music with [all the little notes]-1 perfectly pitched *trace*-1 and neatly stitched together.

example.name: more args
example.text: John pitches his voice as low as possible in order to attract babes.

roleset.name: advertise in strongly positive terms
roleset.note: PITCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pitch' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from pitch.04-v predicate notes)
PITCH-N NOTES: Based on verb entry pitch.04. No corresponding VN Class. (from pitch.02-n)

example.name: sales pitch
example.text: Using cinema, television and print ads, the company pitches Southern Comfort as a grand old drink of the antebellum American South.
example.arg: Using cinema, television and print ads
as a grand old drink of the antebellum American South

example.name: within LVC
example.text: ...So far Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan hasn't made a pitch for the job.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: At least, that's how art director Ken Feldman described his failed pitch for God of War III as an FPS to game director Stig Asmussen.

example.name: let's work together
example.text: ``Everybody pretty much pitched in and cooperated,'' said Stan Perez, a sergeant with the California Highway Patrol.
